name: Collateral Damage (PichaelMarrish)
description:
CONTROLS:

Shift - Speed Up

A - Change Direction

Space - Shoot


RULES:

Defeat the aliens that are attacking the planet but be careful - if you hit the Earth you'll damage it too! Try to take out as many aliens as you can before the Earth is destroyed.

LUDUM DARE PAGE:

Be sure to rate it here!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/collateral-damage

NOTE: 

You may have to click in the game window at first launch!
